Title: #118 Flexible Seating: Getting Rid of Cemetery Style Seating in the Classroom
Description:
Bill Selak @billselak talks about flexible seating and the research behind academic gains when using it. He also shares how flexible seating should go with more student voice and choice in their learning. Prepare to have your mind shift about how we sit in classrooms today!
